Package Business.Entities

Class Game

java.lang.Object
Business.Entities.Game
public class Game extends Object
The class used to run the logic behind simulating an actual game

      gameID - the number associated
      gameName - the name of the game
      player - the player information
      numberAI - the number of AI
      ais - the AI information
      duration - the length of the game

    • Game

      Used to make a new game from the new game menu
      Parameters:
      attackTime - the wait time between attacks
      listener - listener to be used for the new game
